location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘22. Operations in the Caucasus at a standstill on account of the weather. Situation 13-3.17’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:170 x 101 mm, on sheet 236 x 155 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. S.D.O. 3951-3-25.Distinctive Features:Sketch map of the operations in the Caucasus produced to illustrate the British campaign in Mesopotamia in March 1917 depicting the movements of British, Russian and Turkish military forces including position of various divisions with number of troops and guns reported.
